game.engine.stage.scene.object

Class Animated2DSceneObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.engine.stage.scene.object.SceneObject
      • game.engine.stage.scene.object.AnimatedSceneObject
        • game.engine.stage.scene.object.Animated2DSceneObject

  • public class Animated2DSceneObject
extends AnimatedSceneObject
    Animates a sprite. The whole sprite is treated as one single animation.
    Author:
    Marvin Bruns

    • Method Detail

      • recalculateFrame

        protected void recalculateFrame(long elapsedTime)
        Recalculates the current visible frame depending on the elapsed time. Sprite restarts if it reaches end an the last frame has a time > 0.
        Overrides:
        recalculateFrame in class AnimatedSceneObject

      • resetAnimation

        public void resetAnimation()
        Resets actual animation. The first frame in actual row will be painted next time.
        Overrides:
        resetAnimation in class AnimatedSceneObject
